page.title: 15FARMS IN FORTON CONT
page.content: Farm 1.Forton Bank Farm Mr.Hewitt Farm 2.Moorlands Farm Mr.Hardman Farm 3.Moorhead Farm Mr.Lawrenson Farm 4.Nicholsons Farm Mr. Protor Farm 5.Forton Hall Farm Mr.Walmsley Farm 6.Hornby Farm Mr.Walling Farm 7.Goose Green Farm Mr.Garth Farm 8.Hill Side Farm Mr.Peters Farm 9.Richmond Farm Mr. Kelsall Farm 10.Norbreck House Farm Mr.Hoyles Farm 11.Bloomfield House Farm Mr.Armer Farm 12.Clifton House Farm Mr.Croskell {We did a survey on all of these farms {to find out about the crops that are {grown and the animals that are {kept.Most of the farms are dairy farms {and use the land for grazing and the {growing of grass for silage.
